utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionMaskObservationWrapperSquare

class utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionMaskObservationWrapperSquare(env)

Bases: gym.core.ObservationWrapper

A Gym environment observation wrapper for the square environment.

This wrapper flattens the action mask in the observation space.

observation_space

The observation space.

Type

gym.spaces.Dict

__init__(env)

Initializes the observation wrapper.

Fllatens the action mask in the observation space.

Parameters

env (gym.Env) – The original Gym environment.

Methods

__init__(env)

Initializes the observation wrapper.

class_name()

close()

Override close in your subclass to perform any necessary cleanup.

observation(observation)

Overrides the default method of the superclass to flatten the "action_mask" space in the observation dictionary.

render([mode])

Renders the environment.

reset(**kwargs)

Resets the environment to an initial state and returns an initial observation.

seed([seed])

Sets the seed for this env's random number generator(s).

step(action)

Run one timestep of the environment's dynamics.

For example: dict(one=1, two=2).
